info.description:
the purpose of this application is to provide an application
that is using plain go code to define an API

This should demonstrate all the possible comment annotations
that are available to turn go code into a fully compliant swagger 2.0 spec
info.title: bmp-console-api
info.termsOfService: there are no TOS at this moment, use at your own risk we take no responsibility

get.description: IsDeviceStockEnough 查询设备库存是否足够
GetAvailableDeviceTypes 获取该机房内可用机型列表
QueryImagesByDeviceType 根据机型获取绑定的镜像列表
CheckKeypairName 查询keypair名称是否已存在
QueryDefaultSystemPartitions 根据机型和镜像查系统盘默认分区列表
QueryRaidsByDeviceTypeIDAndVolumeType 根据机型查询系统盘/数据盘可用raid列表

put.description: UpdateUserInfo 修改个人信息(除密码)

CommonResponse.description: 新增加或者删除返给前端的true或者false

projectName.description: ProjectName 1~64字符，只支持数字、大小写字母、英文下划线“_”及中划线“-”
ProjectName 1~64字符，只支持数字、大小写字母、英文下划线“_”及中划线“-”
